description:
RiLink: Table describing fronthaul Radio Interface (RI) links in a 5G network.

- dateTime: Timestamp of data record.
- Area_Name: Geographic area of the cell.
- CellId: Unique identifier of the cell site.
- Id2: Duplicate of CellId.
- Id3:  RI link identifier (possibly composed of sub-components).
- vsDataType: Data type identifier (constant).
- vsDataFormatVersion: Version of the data format (constant).
- RiLink.fronthaulDeviceLineRate: Line rate of the fronthaul device (mostly NOT_SET).
- RiLink.riLinkId: Unique identifier of the RI link.
- RiLink.transportType: Type of transport used for the RI link (mostly NOT_SET).
- RiLink.operationalState: Operational status of the RI link (e.g., ENABLED).
- RiLink.availabilityStatus: Availability status of the RI link (mostly empty).
- RiLink.linkTag:  Link tag identifier (mostly 0).
- RiLink.riPortRef2:  Reference to the second RI port involved in the link, containing detailed hierarchical information.
- RiLink.riPortRef1: Reference to the first RI port involved in the link, containing detailed hierarchical information.
